deck.description: If and only if your lifepoint is lower or equal to 1000 you can activate this card. When this card is activated, you can conduct anorther turn
deck.name: Re:End of a Dream

deck.description: Shuffle your opponent's deck when this card is activated.

deck.description: Look at your full deck and place a card you like at the top of the deck.
deck.name: Disorted Fate

deck.description: If you control “Dark Magician”: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target..

deck.description: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.
deck.name: Curse of Dragon

deck.description: If you controll a “Dark Magician” monster, destroy all monster your opponent controll.

deck.description: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.
deck.name: Mystical Elf

deck.description: The ultimate wizard in term of attack and defense.

deck.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Negate the attack and end the battle phase.

deck.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

deck.description: What this creature lacks in size it makes up for in defense when battling in the prairie.

deck.description: Little fluffy ball that like to help others.

deck.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its atk.
